Interface_name: HTTP client using cURL in PHP
Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that implements Alipay payment integration using cURL for HTTP communication with Alipay's API.

Class Description: The AlipayService class provides functionality to interact with Alipay's payment gateway. It handles payment request creation, signing, and communication with Alipay's API endpoints.

Attributes:
- appId: [string] - The application ID provided by Alipay
- notifyUrl: [string] - The URL where Alipay will send payment notifications
- charset: [string] - Character encoding (default: 'utf-8')
- rsaPrivateKey: [string] - The RSA private key for signing requests
- totalFee: [float] - The total payment amount
- outTradeNo: [string] - The merchant's unique order number
- orderName: [string] - Description of the order

Methods:
- __construct() -> [void] - Initializes the class with default charset
- setAppid(string $appid) -> [void] - Sets the Alipay application ID
- setNotifyUrl(string $notifyUrl) -> [void] - Sets the notification URL
- setRsaPrivateKey(string $saPrivateKey) -> [void] - Sets the RSA private key
- setTotalFee(float $payAmount) -> [void] - Sets the payment amount
- setOutTradeNo(string $outTradeNo) -> [void] - Sets the merchant order number
- setOrderName(string $orderName) -> [void] - Sets the order description
- doPay() -> [array] - Prepares and sends payment request to Alipay, returns response
- curlPost(string $url, mixed $postData, array $options) -> [string] - Executes cURL POST request to specified URL
- generateSign(array $params, string $signType) -> [string] - Generates signature for request parameters (implementation not shown in reference code)
